item.title: Kubernetes Overview
item.description: Kubernetes Kubernetes is a container orchistration platform. Contents Core concepts kubectl commands Kubectx & Kubens Secrets - external secrets Core Concepts Deployment Set things like:

item.title: Kubectl CLI
item.description: kubectl is a command line interface tool that interacts with the kube-apiserver/control plane. API resources can generally use with get, describe, delete.

item.title: Kubernetes Troubleshooting
item.description: Kubernetes Troubleshooting NOTE: TL;DR Prerequisite Understanding It’s helpful to have some shared terminology. I encourage you to read the Kubernetes and Helm documentation first.
